Text: Quite a collection here. I have some originally recorded straight to DVD.  Thanks.
... i don' have enough english to thank you!!! this is just GREAT!!!! mm(___)mm

The first two stories you have merged into two two files.  The first part of each story works great but at the change over to part 2 it all goes to tears.  Maybe you would like to re upload Story 1 and Story two in their original part 1-2 format as you did with later episodes
